title: Iran and China share limited national legislature

content.prompt: Iran and China share which of the following institutional arrangements?

choices.label: Federal division of power, which give the localities formal and entrenched powers over the central government
A president who serves for life unless removed by a popularly elected assembly
A national assembly with only limited powers to oversee the executive and enact laws

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Compare two or more course countries based on their political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
